New Records: Glenn Maxwell equalled the record for the most T20 international centuries with his fifth hundred.
Australia posted their highest Twenty20 total on home soil with 241-4.
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell struck a blistering unbeaten 120 off 55 balls.
Marcus Stoinis finished as the pick of the home side’s attack with 3-36.
A bizarre incident occurred when Alzarri Joseph appeared to be run out, but the on-field umpire ruled there had been no appeal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia clinched the series 2-0 with one match to play.
West Indies are co-hosts of the T20 World Cup with the USA later this year.
